Priority:Normal Due date:
Assignee:Jim Campbell % Done:

0%

Description

The documentation currently uses the standard python-sphinx theming, but should be better integrated with the rest of mediagoblin.org.

History

#1
Updated by Jef van Schendel 7 months ago

Hi there!

As pointed out on IRC, instead of copying the rest of the website, a black-on-white color scheme will be a better choice due to the large amounts of text in the docs.

I've made a quick mockup using the colors we have right now, but with the background and text colors switched:

http://schendje.fedorapeople.org/goblin/docsTest.png
http://schendje.fedorapeople.org/goblin/docsTest.svg

I think that's a good start. As soon as I decide on the final color scheme for the website, I'll use it to make a matching one for the docs. But it'll probably look similar to this. :)

Jef
